name: Feed the Dog
description:
This is an interactive online game. 
Use mouse cursor to guide the dog to foods.  move mouse to right or left. Also use mouse scrolling button to speed up or speed down the dog. If you move mouse to sun, then the dog will jump.
Also you can  use following keys.
Press 'w' to speed up
Press 'q' to jump
Press 'd' to move right
Press 'a' to move left
Press 's' to stop
Press 'x' to speed down

[ ===>>> Play the game and win NFT every week.  <<<=== ]

The main character is a dog which is looking for food. By eating foods consisting of bones and steaks, players will get a score. Avoid to touch the black dog, by jumping over it (use 'q' key).
After the game ends, the result will be shown as a QRCode. By scanning the QRCode, the result will be submitted to the server and after that the scoreboard will be represented to the player.
At the end of each week(Sundays) the winners will be announced.

If you want to the prizes, you've to buy and hold the game and play with your game. Even if others play with your collected edition of the game, the submitted score will be yours.

Also if you've one of the following objects on your wallet/collection, then an owl will be automatically added to your game while you play with that. The owl will drop diamonds which has more points that other foods.
1- https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/338419
2- https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/285597

==== >>>> For a better feel and performance, play in full screen. <<<<====

for more details,
